item.title: A/B testing at Zalando: concepts and tools
item.description:
Description

A/B testing is at the core of analytics. We will cover the motivation behind A/B testing, A/B testing at Zalando, pitfalls and learnings, concepts of analysis methods (t-test in particular), Zalandoâ€™s open-source Python library: ExpAn, and hot trends of research topics in A/B testing.
item.dc:creator: Shan Huang
